comment.body:
Hi!, when I add a password following the documentation I get the following error: 
`zeronet.py: error: unrecognized arguments: --ui_password anypassword`

What I'm doing wrong?

> [eibriel](#comment_1_1BYU9zV786auJ29dF3HMAQYhxA2WgN4ofi): Hi!, when I add a password following the documentation I get the following error:zeronet.py: error: unrecognized arguments: --ui_password anypassword
> What I'm doing wrong?

Oh! I get it, I forget to enable de UiPassword plugin

There is an error on the SQL command, should be:
```
SELECT * FROM message LEFT JOIN json USING (json_id) ORDER BY date_added DESC
```

Nice to hear about the good news! :D
I'm looking forward to know more about it!
